main event: On November 7, 1958, a round, dirty-white object the size of a baseball was observed rotating and leaving a trail as it disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 15 seconds., The object was reported as round and dirty-white., It appeared to be the size of a baseball., The object left a trail when it disappeared., This event was documented under Project Blue Book.
witness description: No confirmed witnesses reported in the document.
